SELECT EOWI.EOWI_ID, EOWI.CREATOR, EOWI.CREATE_TIME, EOWI.MODIFIER, EOWI.MODIFY_TIME, EOWI.REC_VER, EOWI.REC_STATUS, EOWI.ORG_ID, EOWI.PM_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO, EOWI.EOWI_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOWI.EOWI_QUANTITY, EOWI.EOWI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOWI.EOWI_NET_WEIGHT, EOWI.EOWI_VOLUME, EOWI.EOWI_LOT_NO, EOWI.EOWI_PRICE, EOWI.EOWI_AMOUNT, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_CODE, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_LEVEL_NAME, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_FM, EOWI.EOWI_TEMPERATURE_TO, EOWI.EOWI_REMARK, NVL(EOWI.EOWI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY,0) as REMAIN_NUMBER, 0 as SPLIT_NUMBER
FROM EO_WORK_ITEM EOWI WHERE 1 = 1 AND EOWI.REC_STATUS = 0 <<AND EOWI.EOWI_ID LIKE :eowiId>> <<AND EOWI.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<AND EOWI.EOWI_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :eowiWorkOrderNo>>
